ygData.subject: Runed Circlet
ygData.msgSnippet: AC 8, 4 INT, 4 WIS, found in Permafrost peacher (lvl 25 mob). I wonder if we send a grp of lvl 30s to that room to camp for it, will we kena mass killing like
ygData.messageBody:
AC 8, 4 INT, 4 WIS, found in Permafrost peacher (lvl 25 mob).

I wonder if we send a grp of lvl 30s to that room to camp for it, will we
kena mass killing like last time?

I know a lvl 35 halfling tank camp there often at our time, and he sell
each in SK for 300-400pp. Of coz I dun mean to hunt it for money, but I
guess this artifact will be good for all casters & hybrids.

If you guys are bored with hunting birdmans, chopping trees, you can join
my icey trip to permafrost for runed circlet, organised within this week.

Only for lvl 30 and above, dun wanna invite train like last time. Even in
Najena, where I can solo in Derz room, I also get killed by a massive train
after my grp invite a lvl 25 necro, KNN. Kena killed for nothing. ;(

Ziltus
